languages.text: Явив себя как обновленного Мессию Прерывания, Паскаль Ханейманн вызвал смятение. Свободный от обетов служения, он не обременил себя властью над флотом, заявив права лишь на одну боевую эскадру и удалившись с паствой для размышлений в дальние сектора. Спустя десятилетия его суда были замечены среди еретиков Котла — тронутого скверной сектора. Техноэкипажи их славили Омниссию, но облик его был страшен — никто прежде не изображал Деус Механикус столь зловещим образом, не дерзал наделить его столь яростным взором утопленных в плоти люменов, облачить в золотую механическую броню и увенчать когтистыми крыльями. Омниссия избрал пугающий и воинственный облик, чтобы явить себя своему нечестивому Мессии.

Having revealed himself as the renewed Messiah of Discontinuing, Pasqal Haneumann caused great turmoil. Free from his vows of service, he did not burden himself with leadership over the fleet. He took just one combat squadron and retreated with his flock to remote sectors for contemplation. Decades later, his ships were spotted among the heretics of the Cauldron, a sector touched by corruption. Their tech-crews revered the Omnissiah, but His image was haunting. No one had dared depict the Deus Mechanicus in this manner before, adorned with sinister flesh-embedded lumens and golden mech armour, and crowned with clawed wings. The Omnissiah chose a grim and belligerent likeness in which to appear before His unrighteous Messiah.
languages.original_text: Явив себя как обновленного Мессию Прерывания, Паскаль Ханейманн вызвал смятение. Свободный от обетов служения, он не обременил себя властью над флотом, заявив права лишь на одну боевую эскадру и удалившись с паствой для размышлений в дальние сектора. traits.locale_text: Having revealed himself as a renewed Messiah of Discontinuing, Pasqal Haneumann caused quite a turmoil. Free from the vows of service, he did not wish to burden himself with the leadership over the fleet. He claimed the rights to one combat squadron and left with his flock for the remote sectors to contemplate. Decades later, his ships were spotted among the heretics of the Cauldron, a sector touched by corruption. Their tech-crews revered the Omnissiah, but his image was haunting. No one has depicted Deus Mechanicus in this manner before. No one dared to envision him with such a wrathful look of lumens embedded in the flesh, to clothe him in golden mech armour and to crown his image with clawed wings. The Omnissiah chose a dreadful and warlike image to appear before his unrighteous Messiah.

languages.text: 帕斯卡·哈努曼宣布自己是新任的终结弥赛亚，这引起了巨大的骚乱。他服役誓言中得到了解脱，他不再承担领导开拓者舰队的重任。他只带走了一支战斗分队，随后便与他的追随者前往偏远星区进行沉思。数十年后，他的舰队在某个被称为“巨釜”的腐化星系中被人发现，所有人都沦为了异端分子。尽管他们的技术兄弟仍然信仰欧姆尼塞亚，但祂的形象已变得极其离经叛道。在此之前，没有人敢以这种方式描绘万机之神——身着金色的机械护甲，嵌入肉体的流明灯闪着不祥的光芒，生出的翅膀上带着利爪。看起来，欧姆尼塞亚选择了冷酷好战的形象，出现在了祂离经叛道的弥赛亚面前。
languages.original_text: Having revealed himself as the renewed Messiah of Discontinuing, Pasqal Haneumann caused great turmoil. Free from his vows of service, he did not burden himself with leadership over the fleet. He took just one combat squadron and retreated with his flock to remote sectors for contemplation. Decades later, his ships were spotted among the heretics of the Cauldron, a sector touched by corruption. Their tech-crews revered the Omnissiah, but His image was haunting. No one had dared depict the Deus Mechanicus in this manner before, adorned with sinister flesh-embedded lumens and golden mech armour, and crowned with clawed wings. The Omnissiah chose a grim and belligerent likeness in which to appear before His unrighteous Messiah.

languages.text: Nachdem Pasqal Haneumann sich als neuer Messias der Unterbrechung offenbart hatte, sorgte er für große Unruhen. Nicht länger an sein Dienstgelübde gebunden, belastete er sich nicht damit, die Flotte zu führen. Er nahm sich nur ein einziges Geschwader und zog sich mit seinen Anhängern in entlegene Sektoren zurück, um sich dort der inneren Einkehr hinzugeben. Jahrzehnte später wurden seine Schiffe unter den Ketzern des Kessels erblickt, eines von der Verderbnis berührten Sektors. Ihre Tech-Crews verehrten den Omnissiah, doch ihr Bild von ihm war grauenhaft. Niemand hatte es je gewagt, den Deus Mechanicus auf diese darzustellen, geschmückt mit finsteren, in das Fleisch verpflanzten Lumens und in einer goldenen Mech-Rüstung, gekrönt durch klauenbewehrte Flügel. Der Omnissiah wählte eine düstere und kampfeslustige Erscheinung für seine Begegnung mit seinem unrechtschaffenen Messias.
languages.original_text: Having revealed himself as the renewed Messiah of Discontinuing, Pasqal Haneumann caused great turmoil. The Omnissiah chose a grim and belligerent likeness in which to appear before His unrighteous Messiah.

languages.text: Pasqal Haneumann fut à l'origine de nombreux troubles lorsqu'il se révéla être le nouveau Messie de l'Interruption. Libéré de ses vœux de service, il ne s'embarrassa pas du commandement de la flotte. Il se fit accompagner d'une seule escouade de combat et se retira avec ses fidèles dans des secteurs reculés afin de se consacrer à la contemplation. Plusieurs décennies plus tard, ses vaisseaux furent repérés parmi les hérétiques du Chaudron, un secteur touché par la corruption. Leurs membres d'équipage priaient l'Omnimessie, mais Son image était terrifiante. Personne n'avait osé représenter le Deus Mechanicus d'une telle manière jusqu'alors, paré d'une armure dorée, de lumens greffés à même sa peau et couronné d'ailes griffues. L'Omnimessie avait choisi une apparence particulièrement sinistre et martiale pour se présenter à son Messie.
languages.original_text: Having revealed himself as the renewed Messiah of Discontinuing, Pasqal Haneumann caused great turmoil. No one had dared depict the Deus Mechanicus in this manner before, adorned with sinister flesh-embedded lumens and golden mech armour, and crowned with clawed wings. languages.text: Tras revelar su identidad como el Mesías de la Discontinuidad renovado, Pasqal Haneumann causó una gran agitación. Libre de sus juramentos de servicio, se negó a llevar la carga del liderazgo de la flota y en su lugar tomó un único escuadrón de combate y se retiró con su rebaño a sectores remotos para dedicarse a la contemplación. Décadas después, se atisbaron sus naves entre los herejes del Caldero, un sector mancillado por la corrupción. Sus tecnotripulaciones adoraban al Omnissiah, pero Su apariencia era aterradora. Nadie había osado representar al Deus Mechanicus de esta forma hasta entonces, adornado con siniestros lumen implantados en su carne, protegido por una armadura mecanizada dorada y coronado con alas que terminaban en garras. El Omnissiah eligió una apariencia sombría y belicosa para aparecerse ante este Mesías impío.
languages.original_text: Having revealed himself as the renewed Messiah of Discontinuing, Pasqal Haneumann caused great turmoil. No one had dared depict the Deus Mechanicus in this manner before, adorned with sinister flesh-embedded lumens and golden mech armour, and crowned with clawed wings. The Omnissiah chose a grim and belligerent likeness in which to appear before His unrighteous Messiah.

languages.text: 新たな廃絶の救世主となったパスカル・ヘニュマンは、大きな波乱を巻き起こした。奉仕の誓いから解き放たれた彼は、艦隊を率いるという責務を引き受けなかった。彼は一個戦闘艦隊だけを引き連れて、仲間と共に僻地の宙域に引きこもり、思索の時を過ごした。数十年後、艦隊は腐敗に蝕まれた「大釜」の異端者と一緒にいるところを目撃される。テッククルーたちは万機神を崇拝していたが、その御姿は恐ろしいものだった。デウス・メカニクスをこのように描く勇気のあるものはこれまでいなかった。不吉な肉を埋め込んだルーメンと黄金のメカアーマーで飾られており、鉤爪のついた翼を頭に戴いている。邪道を往く救世主の前に、万機神は恐ろしく好戦的な姿を現すことを選んだのだ。
languages.original_text: Having revealed himself as the renewed Messiah of Discontinuing, Pasqal Haneumann caused great turmoil. Free from his vows of service, he did not burden himself with leadership over the fleet. He took just one combat squadron and retreated with his flock to remote sectors for contemplation. Decades later, his ships were spotted among the heretics of the Cauldron, a sector touched by corruption. Their tech-crews revered the Omnissiah, but His image was haunting. No one had dared depict the Deus Mechanicus in this manner before, adorned with sinister flesh-embedded lumens and golden mech armour, and crowned with clawed wings. The Omnissiah chose a grim and belligerent likeness in which to appear before His unrighteous Messiah.

traits.locale_text: 新たな廃絶の救世主となったパスカル・ヘニュマンは、大きな波乱を巻き起こした。奉仕の誓いから解き放たれた彼は、艦隊を率いるという責務を引き受けなかった。彼は一個戦闘艦隊だけを引き連れて、仲間と共に僻地の宙域に引きこもり、思索の時を過ごした。数十年後、艦隊は腐敗に蝕まれた「大釜」の異端者と一緒にいるところを目撃される。テッククルーたちは万機神を崇拝していたが、その御姿は恐ろしいものだった。デウス・メカニクスをこのように描く勇気のあるものはこれまでいなかった。不吉な肉を埋め込んだルーメンと黄金のメカアーマーで飾られており、鉤爪のついた翼を頭に戴いている。邪道を往く救世主の前に、万機神は恐ろしく好戦的な姿を現すことを選んだのだ。

languages.text: Kendisinin yenilenmiş Bozulum Mesihi olduğunu açıklayan Pasqal Haneumann, büyük bir kargaşaya neden oldu. Hizmet yeminlerinden azat olduktan sonra filonun liderliğini üstlenme yükünü omuzlamadı. Tek bir muharebe eskadrası aldı ve takipçileriyle ücra sektörlere çekilip muhakemeye odaklandı. On yıllar sonra gemileri, yozlaşmanın dokunduğu Kazan sektöründen gelen kâfirlerin arasında görüldü. Tekno mürettebatları Hermesih'e tapınırken ilahın sureti, rahatsız ediciydi. Kimse Deus Mechanicus'u daha önce bu şekilde, etlerle bezeli lümenlerle, altın mekazırh içinde ve pençeli kanatlarla taçlandırılmış vaziyete tasvir etmemişti. Hermesih; günahkâr Mesih'ine benzeyen, korkunç ve muharip bir görünüm seçmişti.
languages.original_text: Having revealed himself as the renewed Messiah of Discontinuing, Pasqal Haneumann caused great turmoil. Free from his vows of service, he did not burden himself with leadership over the fleet. He took just one combat squadron and retreated with his flock to remote sectors for contemplation. Decades later, his ships were spotted among the heretics of the Cauldron, a sector touched by corruption. Their tech-crews revered the Omnissiah, but His image was haunting. No one had dared depict the Deus Mechanicus in this manner before, adorned with sinister flesh-embedded lumens and golden mech armour, and crowned with clawed wings. The Omnissiah chose a grim and belligerent likeness in which to appear before His unrighteous Messiah.

traits.locale_text: Kendisinin yenilenmiş Devamsızlık Mesihi olduğunu açıklayan Pasqal Haneumann büyük olay yarattı. Hizmet yeminlerinden azat olduktan sonra filonun liderliğini üstlenme yükünü omuzlamadı. Tek bir muharebe eskadrası aldı ve takipçileriyle beraber ücra sektörlere çekilerek meditasyon yaptı. On yıllar sonra gemileri, yozlaşmanın dokunduğu bir sektör olan Kazan'dan gelen kâfirlerin arasında görüldü. Tekno mürettebatları Hermesih'e tapınıyordu ancak ilahın sureti rahatsız ediciydi. Kimse Deus Mechanicus'u daha önce bu şekilde, etlerle bezeli lümenlerle, altın mek zırh içinde ve pençeli kanatlarla taçlandırılmış hâlde tasvir etmemişti. Hermesih, karşısındaki günahkâr Mesih'ine benzeyen, korkunç ve muharip bir görünüm seçmişti.
